HR Audits & Policy Reframing

  • ensuring 100% compliance with all laws, regulations and global HR best practise along the entire HR value chain from recruitment, onboarding, performance management, compensation & benefits, rewards and recognition, learning & development, employee happiness & engagement and separation.

Organizational Development

  • engineering organizational structures to fit into the business strategy.

Recruitment & Head-hunting

  • sourcing talent for vacancies

Job evaluations & performance tracking

  • crafting job profiles, key performance indicators mapped onto objective performance tracking tools with a focus on improving productivity.

Employee Engagement

  • innovative lasting initiatives to impact team spirit, high performance work culture and happy conducive work environment aimed at attracting and retaining talent and creating positive employer brand in the wider market.

Meet Your Consultant Azmina Mulji

Qualifications
